description: This notification signifies that the specified server has been
marked alive. The ServerName identifies the server and the
SPIdentfier identifies the session-pic which originated this
notification.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgGtpGWUpNotify JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgServerName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgServicePicName s EXAMPLE

where <a> is the slot and <b> could be either 0 or 1.

description: This notification signifies that the specified server has been
marked dead. The ServerName identifies the server and the
SPIdentfier identifies the session-pic which originated this
notification.

description: This signifies change in the destination of the CDRs
(Charging Data Record)

Summary.eval: ($v2==1) ? 'CDRs are redirected to active CGF: $v4' : ($v2==2) ? 'CGF ($v4) is down; CDRs are redirected to backup local storage device' : 'CGF ($v4) is down; No backup storage configured'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgCDRDestNotify JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgCDRDest i 1 JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgTSPName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgCgfIpAddress a 192.0.2.1

description: Gateway Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName

description: This indicates any transisitions in the state of the CGF.
Value 1 indicates one of the CGF for the Group came up. Redirecting CDRs to the Active CGF.
Value 2 indicates last active CGF for the Group went down. CDRs being written to backup Local storage device.
Value 3 indicates last active CGF for the Group went down. Backup Local storage device not configured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgCDRDest

description: A string that uniquely identifies the Transport Profile.

description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of inernal memory space for charging records. This alarm is sent outwhen the utilization exceeds or falls below configured high threshold value. Thealarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgSgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

Summary.eval: ($v4==1) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 1 critical high threshold value' : (($v4==3) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 2 critical high threshold value' : 'Internal memory usage normal')

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgMemHighThresNotify JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgTSPName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgServicePicName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgMemLimit i 1 JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgAlarmStatus i 1

description: Gateway Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName

description: A string that uniquely identifies the Transport Profile.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgTSPName

description: This identifies the session-pic, in the form ms-a/b/0,
where <a> is the slot and <b> could be either 0 or 1.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgServicePicName

description: This indicates any transisitions in the state of the CGF.
Value 1 indicates System has reached Level 1 critical memory threshold.
Action - Check the CGF server connections. If local storage is enabled
please ftp the charging records immediately.
If local storage is not enabled, please enable it so the
charging records can be stored in local persistent storage.
Risk - No new sessions will be allowed.
Value 2 indicates System reaching Level 1 critical memory threshold
condition has been resolved.
Value 3 indicates System has reached Level 2 critical memory threshold.
Action - Check the CGF server connections. If local storage is enabled
please ftp the charging records immediately.
If local storage is not enabled, please enable it so the
charging records can be stored in local persistent storage.
Risk - New and existing sessions will be not be allowed.
Value 4 indicates System reaching Level 2 critical memory threshold
condition has been resolved.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgMemLimit

description: Value 1 indicates that the Alarm for a particular condition is present.
Value 2 indicates that the Alarm for a particular condition is absent.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgAlarmStatus

description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of inernal memory space for charging records. This alarm is sent outwhen the utilization exceeds or falls below configured medium threshold value. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgSgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

Summary.eval: ($v4==1) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 1 critical medium threshold value' : (($v4==3) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 2 critical medium threshold value' : 'Internal memory usage normal')

variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-SGW-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgSgwCgAlarmStatus

description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of local storage space for charging records. This alarm is sent out when the utilization exceeds or falls below configured high threshold of available disk space. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgSgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

Summary.eval: ($v2==1) ? 'Local storage space utilization $v3 % is above high threshold' : 'Local storage space utilization $v3 % is below high threshold'

description: Gateway Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName
